title: Busch Gardens Tampa Bay
short_description: African-themed adventure park with thrilling roller coasters and animal encounters
description:
Busch Gardens Tampa Bay is a 335-acre African-themed animal theme park that combines world-class thrill rides with up-close animal encounters. The park is home to more than 12,000 animals representing over 300 species.

Experience some of the world's most intense roller coasters including SheiKra, a floorless dive coaster with a 90-degree drop, and Iron Gwazi, North America's tallest and fastest hybrid coaster. The park also features live shows, dining experiences, and seasonal events like Howl-O-Scream and Christmas Town.

Explore themed areas like Serengeti Plain, where you can see giraffes, zebras, and rhinos roaming freely, or visit the Edge of Africa for walking safari experiences.

title: Florida Aquarium
short_description: Interactive aquarium showcasing Florida's diverse aquatic ecosystems
description:
The Florida Aquarium is a 501(c)(3) not-for-profit organization dedicated to inspiring stewardship of our natural environment. Located in downtown Tampa's Channel District, the aquarium features more than 8,000 aquatic plants and animals from around the world.

Journey through multiple exhibits including Wetlands Trail, Bays and Beaches, Coral Reef, and Ocean Commotion. Experience hands-on touch tanks, watch playful otters, and walk through a 360-degree underwater tunnel surrounded by sharks, sea turtles, and stingrays.

The aquarium also offers unique experiences like Wild Dolphin Cruises, Dive with the Sharks programs, and behind-the-scenes tours. Their conservation efforts include coral restoration and sea turtle rehabilitation.
